description: Bearded man seated at a table with a carved apron, writing; ghostly image of PR arm and hand on top of man's PR arm and hand
markings: [GURNEY & SON FIFTH AVE], in black, below image; coat of arms with [I HAVE CHAINED THE SUN TO SERVE ME], on a ribbon below, on back; [GURNEY], below coat of arms; [-th Avenue, Cor. 16th St. N.Y.], in black, at bottom edge on back
title: Untitled [man writing with hand being guided by spirit hand]
